title: Password Doesnt work
body: My password does not work for my other account or the lol website. I says invalid username/password and ive tried the recover password thing but it does not send any emails. I think I was hacked please help!

replies.body:
We can assist in recovering your account if you submit a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to our account recovery team.

We've had a lot of tickets submitted recently, so response times are a bit longer than normal. Let me know if you have any questions.
I gave one a while ago and thank you for noticing this. It means a lot.
